channel.title: Whatsapp on dæmon1024
channel.description: Recent content in Whatsapp on dæmon1024

item.title: Leaving WhatsApp . .
item.description: The reasons seems to be obvious, the new privacy policy. Am I also part of the herd? Is it because everyone seems to be moving to it? Na I have been using signal for quite a time now but I mostly used it for saving notes to self, since nobody else seemed to use it. Even if you are trying it out just because Elon Musk tweeted “Use Signal” it’s fine, Signal is worth it.
